original_text: Section 1 (2) of this act affirmed the provision in the Treaty that the position of Ireland remained a matter for the Parliament of Northern Ireland:

original_text: There are several makers of reproduction equipment and many artists work with collodion around the globe.
modified_text: There are several makers of reproduction equipment and collodion is worked with by many artists around the globe.
rationale: The original sentence contains an active clause 'many artists work with collodion'. To convert this into passive voice, the object 'collodion' is made the subject of the sentence, and the original subject 'many artists' is introduced by the preposition 'by'. The verb 'work' is changed to its past participle form 'worked' and used with the auxiliary verb 'is' to form the passive voice.

original_text: Caunter remained a regular character until new executive producer Louise Berridge axed him in 2003, a decision which she later stated she regretted.

rationale: The original sentence was in active voice, with 'Louise Berridge' as the subject performing the action of axing 'Caunter'. To convert it into passive voice, 'Caunter' becomes the subject being acted upon, and 'Louise Berridge' is introduced by the preposition 'by' to indicate the doer of the action. The rest of the sentence remains unchanged to keep the meaning and entities intact.

original_text: He successfully led Paris's bid for the 2024 Summer Olympics and is serving as the head of the organizing committee for those games.
modified_text: Paris's bid for the 2024 Summer Olympics was successfully led by him, and the head of the organizing committee for those games is being served by him.
rationale: The original sentence was in active voice, so it was rewritten in passive voice. The subject 'He' was moved to the position of the agent, and the objects 'Paris's bid for the 2024 Summer Olympics' and 'the head of the organizing committee for those games' were moved to the subject position of the respective clauses. The verbs 'led' and 'is serving' were changed to the passive forms 'was led' and 'is being served' to maintain the sentence meaning while transforming the voice.

original_text: All lyrics written by Kellin Quinn and Jesse Lawson unless noted, all music composed by Sleeping with Sirens

original_text: The basis of the column is orientated northwest/southeast, while its capital is aligned north/south, possibly so that the statue could look towards the nearby Church of the Holy Apostles.
